title: Chrono-spatial reproductive phenology of Swertia bimaculata Hook.f. & Thomson ex C.B.Clarke reveals suitability as climate-changing bio-indicator along the Sikkim Himalayan altitude
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Jitendra Kumar Shukla, Kishor Basor, Preeti Dhakal, Sandhya Thapa, Evanylla Kharlyngdoh, Sunil S. Thorat, Pardeep Bhardwaj, Sushil K. Chaudhary, Pulok K. Mukherjee
